verbose_text: PCa progression has been associated with increases in the levels of SNAIL and SLUG, which are SNAIL family members, and TWIST transcription factors, while the levels of epithelial cadherin (E-cadherin) and other epithelial markers such as syndecan-1 (SDC-1) decrease following PCa progression.
evidence: epithelial cadherin (E-cadherin) and other epithelial markers such as syndecan-1 (SDC-1) decrease following PCa
